questions:

A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Farm animals
D) Art and culture

B) At the beach
C) On a farm
D) Inside a museum

A) A landscape
B) A person
C) A goat and a chicken
D) A building

A) A tree
B) A goat
C) A car
D) A house

B) Water
C) Muddy ground
D) Buildings

B) Grass
C) Straw
D) Rocks

B) Sleeping
C) Standing

D) Grey

D) Grass
